title: Trump arrives at World Series game with Republican lawmakers
text:
President Trump has arrived at Nationals Park for Game 5 of the World Series between the Washington Nationals and the Houston Astros.

A Fox News reporter tweeted that he was joined by five Republican members of Congress: House Minority Whip Steve Scalise, Rep. Liz Cheney, Rep. Matt Gaetz and Sens. Lindsey Graham and Marco Rubio.

Also joining the president are First Lady Melania Trump and some wounded military veterans, per reports.

Trump attending Game 5 of the World Series w/Scalise, Liz Cheney, Gaetz, Graham & Rubio — Chad Pergram (@ChadPergram) October 28, 2019

Trump is being joined at World Series game by First Lady Melania Trump and wounded veterans. Elected officials also expected to visit him in his box. — Josh Dawsey (@jdawsey1) October 27, 2019

Trump is expected to leave the game early to avoid a major disruption. Security at the ballpark was beefed up for the president’s arrival.

description: President Trump has arrived at Nationals Park for Game 5 of the World Series between the Washington Nationals and the Houston Astros.
